document_data.name: Johari
document_data.mainbody:
'''Johari''' was a [[half-orc]] resident of [[Neverwinter]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|Neverwinter is as much MY home as is it for any of these guardsmen, and I want to help without being looked at like I'm some kind of traitor!|Johari}}
document_data.Personality: Johari was proud to call Neverwinter her home and naturally felt she and her kind should be afforded the same rights and trust as its other citizens.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, Johari tried to enter the [[Tower District]] in order to help in the city's fight against the occupying [[Many-Arrows]] [[orc]]s. However, Patrol Captain [[Lanward]] of the [[Neverwinter Guard]] was preventing half-orcs passing the [[Fallen Tower]] area out of fear they would join the other side. Johari was incensed by this and the two argued. She sought out a half-orc adventurer and Guard recruit to speak to Lanward and allow their kind into the rest of the district.
